image.title: 100" Hooker telescope at Mt. Wilson. The total weight of the telescope is about 100 tons. The mirror is mounted in the lower end of the telescope. It is 100" in diameter. 13 " thick at the outer edge and weighs 4 1/2 tons. The upper concave surface is covered by a thin but brilliant coat of aluminum and focuses the light of a star in the same way as a lens.
